intro: Lead your team, fight with honor, and rise as a hero.
description:
Enter the frontline in Counter Force, an action-packed tactical shooter where precision, leadership, and quick thinking decide every mission. As the commander of an elite counter-terror unit, you’ll face dangerous enemies, rescue civilians, and restore order in high-risk operations across hostile locations. Every move matters when failure is not an option.

Game Features:
- Elite Task Unit – Control a skilled strike team built for combat and special operations.
- Smart Tactical Play – Plan attacks, choose routes, and react to changing threats.
- Fast-Paced Gunfights – Engage enemies with realistic weapons and intense shooting action.
- Mission-Based Progression – Complete critical objectives to unlock new challenges and gear.
- Dynamic Battle Zones – Fight through urban areas, secured compounds, and danger-filled environments.
- High-Risk Operations – Stay alert as enemy reinforcements and unexpected events keep missions unpredictable.

The battlefield is waiting. Take command, execute with precision, and prove you have what it takes to lead Counter Force.
